mapper.select:
select * from publicsentiment
( onecurrentname like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%") or twocurrentname like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%") or onecurrentidcard like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%") or twocurrentidcard like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%") or mainmacts like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%") )
and policestationid = #{policestationid}
order by id desc
